summary:
First of all, make sure that your weight is either on 0 or 100

adds 7 different Yukata designs that are all craftable, upgradeable and enchantable the whole thing has 4 parts, the bracers, yukata (which has 7 different designs), flower band and sandals..
descriptionHtml:
[center]Don't forget to add your own screenshots! :D[/center]
[center][img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/25580-1-1364358509.png[/img][/center]
[size=1][color=orange][font=arial][right][b]Ownership: Loshirai14[/b][/right][/font][/color][color=orange][font=arial][right][b]User ID: 4958627[/b][/right][/font][/color][color=orange][font=arial][right][b]Don't forget to VOTE and ENDORSE![/b][/right][/font][/color][/size]
[center][size=6][font=papyrus]Requires Skyrim 1.6.89 or higher[/font][/size][/center]
[center][font=papyrus][size=4]Check out my other mods [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/Images/179291]HERE[/url][/size][/font][/center]
[center][img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/26282-1-1354706416.png[/img][/center]
[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/25580-2-1353144913.png[/img]
First of all, make sure that your weight is either on 0 or 100
[size=1]how to set your weight slider to 0 or 100:
step 1: open console
step 2: type 'player.setnpcweight 0' or 'player.setnpcweight 100'
step 3: enter[/size]

adds 7 different Yukata designs that are all craftable, upgradeable and enchantable
the whole thing has 4 parts, the bracers, yukata (which has 7 different designs), flower band and sandals..

Parts:
- Flowerband
- Yukata Coat
- Sandals
- Bracers
[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/25580-4-1353144913.png[/img]
- download main file
- extract files using winRAR
- copy extracted files then paste it in your data folder
- open skyrim launcher or any mod manager you are using
- activate the mod
- start game and enjoy
author: Loshirai14

files.name: Yukata Armor - Standalone v2a
files.changelogHtml:
added weight slider
changed helm into a flower headband
